page.title: 03LIVING IN SHAW 1985
page.content: 1.Do you live in Shaw? Yes:89% No:11% 2.Do you like Shaw with all its mills? Yes:51% No:49% 3.What do you like about Shaw? The feel of village life. 4.What do you dislike abou Shaw? The residential expansion. 5.Do you often come shopping in Shaw? Yes:74% No:26% 6.Do you think Shaw has a good range of shops? Yes:71% No:29% 7.Do you work in Shaw? Yes:42% No:58% 8.Do you think Shaw is a busy place? Yes:12% No:88% 9.Do you think Shaw has changed a lot? Yes:94% No:6% 10.Do you know any of Shaw's history? Yes:30% No:70%
